casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 2080. Fourth Appellate District. August 10, 1938.] ANNA L. HARTMAN, Petitioner and Respondent, v. CORPORATION OF AMERICA (a Corporation) et al., Respondents; BANK OF AMERICA NATIONAL TRUST AND SAVINGS ASSOCIATION (a National Banking Association), Appellant.

Louis Ferrari, Edmund Nelson and Hugo A. Steinmeyer for Appellant.

Hugh S. MacKinnon for Petitioner and Respondent.

BARNARD, P. J.

This is an appeal from an order extending a previous order postponing a sale under a deed of trust.

All of the material facts in this ease are similar to those in the case of Anna L. Hartman v. Bank of America, Civil No. 2079, this day decided (ante, p. 98 [82 Pac. (2d) 39]). The questions at law presented in the two cases are identical.

For the reasons given in the ease referred to the order appealed from is reversed.

Marks, J., concurred.
